creditline: Gift of Fay M. Gallus and Richard Sweet
description: black and white etching of a dark, non-descript room; figure covered with a white sheet stands to the PL of a short, male figure with dark pants and a white shirt, PL hand in the pocket of his pants
portfolio: From Six Fairy Tales from the Brothers Grimm
signed: on front in LRC, in pencil: David Hockney | on back, in LLC, in brown ink: Grimm E.1.A 46/100
title: The Sexton Disguised as a Ghost
